name: Celestial
description: Your body's toughness and resilience to damage are out of this world.
//: Ideally she should have minor reduction to pain, half of PAINRESIST if not 66%. More ideally, she should gain pain resist buffs while fighting on melee

name: Gyokuto
description: You're a Moon rabbit. Your kind was [REDACTED] by the Lunarians to serve them like tools. Not that you mind (that much), as you're naturally carefree. How convenient.
//: This trait should also grant immunity to mental effects, like the taint and visuals effects

name: Gyokuto ears
description: Your pair of rabbit ears look normal to you but unlike anything to everyone else.

name: Gyokuto tail
description: You have a fluffy little rabbit tail.

name: Half-human half-phantom
description: Not fully human, yet not fully inhuman, you have the best of both worlds.  Also, your phantom half is always following around.
//: Recheck mutation after adding the ghosts and youkai enemies

name: Hell raven
description: You're a raven youkai originating from (Former) Hell.
//: Can't find how to use percentage dmg reduction, this value should be 66% of all received fire damage + base say, 4, so it blocks minor fire attacks instead of being completely immune

name: Hourai person
description: Your drank from the accursed Hourai Elixir ages ago.  You ceased to age, you never become ill, and you will never die.  At least that's how it was before the Cataclysm.

name: Kasha
description: You're a feline-looking youkai originating from (Former) Hell.  Currently, you're posing as a human.  Activate the mutation to switch to youkai form.
//: If only there was a way to instead block all animalistic mutations instead...

name: Kasha (youkai form)
description: You're a feline-looking youkai originating from (Former) Hell.  Currently, you're transformed into your feline-like form.  Activate the mutation to switch forms.

name: Kasha ears
description: You have an extra pair of black cat ears.  In reality, these are your actual ears.

name: Kasha tails
description: You have a pair of black cat tails.

name: Non-human
description: You're fundamentally not human despite looking like one, and thus you're not bound by their customs and rules. You're 'just' 'off' according to genuine humans.
//: I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0

name: Oarfish youkai
description: You're an oarfish youkai, a heavenly messenger originating from spectral oceans.

name: Crow Tengu
description: A member of the ancient and strictly hierarchical Tengu, you're agile and nimble, and your job is to gather information.
//: TOLERANCE because I can't find a way to set alcohol resistance only to something like 95%

name: Tsuchigumo (human form)
description: You're a spider youkai originating from caves and dark places in the Earth.  Currently, you're posing as a human.  Activate the mutation to switch forms.
//: Also, add some kind of social bonus for enemies with the YOUKAI trait or plus ARACHNID. In fact I should probably check all social interactions of Youkai in general at some point
//2: This needs some sort of small bonus over the active form below, so she has a reason to switch forms at all

name: Tsuchigumo (youkai form)
description: You're a spider youkai originating from caves and dark places in the Earth.  Currently, you're (partially) transformed into your youkai form, revealing your hidden legs.  Activate the mutation to switch forms.

name: Vampire
description: A very famous Western youkai, you must feed upon humans to survive.  You're powerful, but at the same time have lots of weaknesses.
//: Should be (1, 1, 0.5), then and double or triple that by 'digesting' human blood, with an active ability
//2: I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0

name: Vampire shapeshifting (human)
description: Your nature allows you to shapeshift, although almost completely as your bat wings are still visible.  Currently, you're posing as a human.  Activate the mutation to switch to youkai form.

name: Vampire shapeshifting (bat)
description: If nothing else revealed you're a vampire, this will surely do.  You're currently transformed into bat form.  Activate the mutation to switch forms.

name: Youkai
description: You're fundamentally not human despite looking like one, and thus you're not bound by their customs and rules.  You naturally also find them appetizing.
//: I need to set the penalty (and bonus) of eating human flesh to 0
//2: There are peaceful youkai, so I need to further divide this into subspecies such as 'Vampire'

name: Spiritual energy user
description: Magic, mana, qi, energy, all of it can also be described as spiritual energy.  You naturally generate it over time.
//: This equals a full mana pool every 40 minutes or so

name: Natural energy user
description: You naturally absorb and accumulate natural energy over time.  In contrast to normal energy users, your regeneration rate is slowed, but your experience and fine control makes up for it.
//: This equals a full mana pool every 1 h 20 minutes or so. Should have some extra benefit to compensate, but what?

name: Spiritual energy user (untrained)
description: While you can use spiritual energy, the lack of training makes you regenerate it much slower over time, but still, much faster than the average human.
//: This equals a full mana pool every 2 h or so

name: Wind god girl
description: You're a member of the Tengu, specifically of the Crow caste.

name: The Devil's Destructive Little Sister
description: You're the little sister of the Scarlet Devil.

name: Scarlet messenger
description: You're the Dragon Palace messenger in charge of Gensokyo, and the Hinanawi clan as of late.

name: Corpse carrier cheering hellcat
description: You're one of the pets of the mistress of Chireiden, a Former Hell mansion.  Your job is to carry corpses to the Hell of Blazing fires (read: the Remains of Blazing Hell), to regulate its heat with your trusty corpse wheelbarrow.
//: Add like 2 - 4 soul dmg reduction when I implement that

name: Rainbow Gatekeeper
description: You're the laid back, sleepy, yet loyal guard and garden keeper of the Scarlet Devil Mansion.

name: Immortal Guide of the Bamboo Forest
description: Your countless years of fighting your rival has granted you lots of fighting skills, primarily with kicking attacks and strong direct blows.

name: Vessel of Yatagarasu
description: You're the pet of the mistress of Chireiden, a Former Hell mansion.  Your job was helping Orin in regulate the Hell of Blazing Fires, but you were "promoted" into being a key component from the Underground Nuclear Reactor after absorbing the remains of Yatagarasu, and later helping the Kappa into developing a more automatic Fusion version.  A wild life for sure.

name: Eternal Young Scarlet Moon
description: You're the Mistress of the Scarlet Devil Mansion.

name: Girl between the Spheres of Perception
description: You're the Eldest daughter of the Hinanawi clan.  Very carefree, very problematic, and very spoiled, you do what you want whenever you want.

name: Bright web from the dark cave
description: You're the good-natured earth spider youkai living at the Underground entrance.

name: Half-Human Half-Phantom dual-wielding gardener
description: You're the gardener and guardian of Hakugyokurou, a Netherworld mansion.
Eating food wasn't a problem until this point.  It's possible for you to eat food coming from Earth and other impure places, but you will obtain slight less nutrition from it.

name: Mysterious
description: You have a mysterious past.

name: Hell raven wings
description: You have a pair of large raven wings.  Activate the mutation to spread your wings, enabling you to fly.

name: Hell raven wings (flight)
description: Your wings are now prepared for flying.  Activate the mutation to fold your wings, disabling flight.

name: Crow wings
description: You have a pair of relatively small crow wings.  Activate the mutation to enable flight.

transform.msg_transform: You prepare your wings to fly.

name: Crow wings (flight)
description: Your wings are now prepared for flying.  Activate to disable flight.

name: Vessel of Yatagarasu
description: You're the living vessel of the Yatagarasu, an incarnation of the Sun.
